articles.title: Market Trading Guide: Asian Paints, IRFC among 8 top stock recommendations for Thursday - Stock Ideas - The Economic Times
articles.description: Equity benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty buckled under heavy selling pressure to sink below record high levels on Wednesday, tracking deep losses in metal, auto and IT stocks amid widespread profit booking after recent gains. The 30-share index closed lower …
